meanings.definition: Bonteboks: a type of antelope found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The bonteboks grazed peacefully in the grassy savannah.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of bonteboks while on safari in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The bonteboks decided to have a race with the zebras for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as swift and graceful as a bonteboks in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The bonteboks' reddish-brown coats shimmered in the sunlight.
